"Couldn't add messages containing \"%s\" to block list. Try again."
Wait while the items are added to the slideshow.
Turn on \"Update info automatically\" or check your network connection
"Couldn't download audio. Mi Message is offline or isn't available."
No network connection or wrong SIM card is installed. Install the SIM card from which the message was sent and connect to the network.
This message is sent from an unknown number.
It might take several minutes to activate this feature.
This phone number will be added to blocklist. All messages sent from this number will be blocked.
All messages sent from %s will be blocked. You might not be able to receive verification codes or bills sent by this service.
Your message has no valid recipients.
Cloud storage is full. Upgrade your membership to sync latest items.
Turn on sync with the cloud to sync messages

"Smart messaging services are provided by your carrier. Messaging needs to connect to the Internet and access your location in order to provide these services. You must agree to your carrier's %1s before you start using these services. Agree?"
Previous conversations with this contact will no longer be hidden.
Stop blocking such messages? Previously blocked messages will appear in your inbox.
A large number of multimedia messages are being sent.
One of your recipients includes an email address. This message will be sent as an MMS, which may result in extra charges from you carrier.
All the messages belong to selected numbers will be deleted in this phone. You can restore them in i.mi.com.
Allow Messaging to connect to the network to be able to report items.
All messages from %s (except verification codes) will be moved to promotional messages.
Correct the info about this message? To do this, MIUI needs to upload the phone number (%1$s), the contents of the message, and the info about nearby location to its servers.

Mi Message allows you to send messages to other Xiaomi users without incurring charges. An outgoing SMS message is required to activate Mi Message. Your carrier will charge you for this message. You must agree to our \"%1$s\" and \"%2$s\" before using Mi Message.

"Your SIM card isn't fully operational with this phone because it doesn't comply with the terms and conditions of your subscription. If you have any questions or need more information about this matter, please contact Xiaomi service centers or the store that sold products to you."
Your message will be discarded because it has no valid recipients.
"Can't download right now. Try again later."
Download Calendar to be able to add calendar events and reminders. Open GetApps now?
Wait until recording has finished downloading
Duration must be greater than 0 seconds
This will relaunch the Messaging app. Continue anyway?
The state of threads and recipients is inconsistent. Capture a bug report and report it via http://go/droidanizer
Message size is not enough to add a slide
"You can't add this %1$s to your message."
"This wasn't sent from a fake base cell"
Looks like this message was sent from the phone number which is different from the one displayed. Be cautious of the SMS containing financial requests.
You can only send messages to your fixed dialing numbers.
Upload messages from your other SIM cards?
To sync messages from Xiaomi Cloud, sign in to your Xiaomi Account and turn on SMS sync.
Sync messages from Xiaomi Cloud in the Messaging settings.

"Can't send messages. Check your SIM card."

"Can't send your message right now. Will send when service becomes available."
"Couldn't send message. Turn on mobile data to send."
The message is too big to attach a video.
Sync with the cloud is off
Withdraw consent to the Privacy Policy of 5G Messaging
All MMS except the messages sent from authorized senders will be blocked. Authorized senders include network carriers, national railway booking systems, etc.
"This sender isn't in your contacts. This message might be unsolicited."
This app needs to connect to the internet to provide you with basic services. We recommend that you turn on Mi Message and Smart Messaging services.
Welcome to Mi Message! An outgoing SMS message is required to activate Mi Message. Your carrier will charge you for this message.
We want you to get the most out of Mi Message.
Smart Messaging can recognize sender IDs, provide smart menu services, and identify suspicious messages.
When this feature is on, a small amount of mobile data is required to check whether the other user is online. Agree?
"Send multimedia messages as MMS over mobile data connection when you're not connected to Wi-Fi. You will incur regular charges from your carrier."
"Send messages as SMS over mobile data connection when you're not connected to Wi-Fi. You will incur regular charges from your carrier."
"You've sent %1$d SMS and %2$d MMS for free"
"Send SMS and MMS messages to other Xiaomi devices without incurring charges when you're connected to Wi-Fi."
Send messages to other Xiaomi devices without incurring charges
Block Mi Messages from unknown numbers
"You'll still be able to receive regular SMS from unknown numbers. You can turn this feature on or off anytime in Messages > Settings."
Block Mi Messages from unknown numbers
Only allow Mi Messages from your contacts

"Mi Message lets you send messages to other Mi Message users over the internet without incurring charges. An outgoing SMS message is required to activate Mi Message. Your carrier will charge you for this message."
Mi Message allows MIUI users to send and receive free SMS and MMS messages.
Withdraw consent to the Privacy Policy of Mi Message
Tap to block Mi Messages from unknown numbers

"For displaying beginner's guide to new users"
For saving images, videos, files, and other RCS attachments
This app requires permission to access files stored on your device
Messaging needs to access contacts to be able to work normally. You can change permissions in Settings > Apps > System app settings.
RCS allows compressing images before sending. Compress images or send original files?
RCS allows compressing videos before sending. Compress videos or send original files?
Get the latest info on delivery and other services

Set number of messages to save
Receive reports when your messages are delivered to the other person
Show blocked SMS in conversations list
Show profile photos and contact info in list view
Automatically assign a picture to contacts without one
Detect one-time passwords and show quick menus
Copy one-time passwords, track delivery, check phone balance, and display tickets and bills as cards automatically
Allow messages to load content from websites
Delete old messages as limits are reached
Show delivery status for sent messages
Receive sound notifications for delivered messages.
Turn on to group notifications about promotional messages in the Notification shade
Move promotional and financial messages to separate tabs
Show messages on the Lock screen and in the Notification shade
Toggle this switch to grant or revoke your authorization
Send delivery confirmation message to sender when you receive a multimedia message
Display messages containing videos, images, and complex formatting as cards
Turn on to read messages out loud as they are received. Press the Volume down or Power button to stop playback.
Install Mi AI Speech Engine to be able to use this feature
Download MMS content when international roaming

A server error occurred. Wait a minute or two and try again.

"If you continue, you'll withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of %s. The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period in accordance with applicable laws and regulations unless required otherwise. As %s provides its services based on the collection of the necessary personal information, your withdrawal of consent will be held as refusing to accept %s services. Withdraw consent now?"
"%s Privacy Policy was updated: %s Read and agree to the new version of Privacy Policy before you continue."
Privacy protection password works for photos, notes, and hidden folders.
Use Privacy protection password. It works for photos, notes and hidden folders.
Messaging password will be replaced with Privacy protection password which works for photos, notes, and hidden folders.
Your device needs to connect to the network for you to be able to withdraw consent. Check your network settings and try again.

By toggling off the switch, you withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of Messaging. We will cease to collect your personal information. The personal information already collected and retained will be deleted within the specific period as required by applicable laws. Mi Message and Smart Messaging provided by Messaging need to collect necessary personal information to provide you with basic services. Your withdrawal of consent to the Privacy Policy of Messaging will be held as refusing to accept the services based on collected personal information provided by Mi Message and Smart Messaging.
By toggling off the switch, you withdraw your consent to the Privacy Policy of Messaging.

5G Messaging is an instant messaging service provided by China Mobile. You can turn this feature off in the Settings.

"We shall protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws, regulations, and privacy policies. If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use this app."
You can revoke your authorization and turn off services in the Messaging settings.
Read and agree to our %1s before using this feature.
Allow this app to connect to the Internet and grant the optional permissions to be able to use all its features.
Welcome to Messaging! You can use this app to send and receive text and multimedia messages.

Reported messages are uploaded to our servers along with the phone numbers of their senders. These messages are only used to improve Blocklist functionality.
